CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "LON"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "MAN"),"2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "NYC"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "MIA"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "DFW"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "BOG"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "BUE"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "GIG"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "NBO"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "VIE"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "PRG"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "HAM"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "LED"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "YVR"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "MRU"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "LIM"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL( City__c , "DUB"), "2", "1")))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Tier
